SELECT c.comment_idx, c.board_idx, c.content, c.create_date, c.nickname, c.code_name, c.use_yn, b.id FROM comment c JOIN board b ON c.board_idx = b.board_idx WHERE b.id = #{id} AND c.code_name IN ('B100', 'B101') AND c.use_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY c.create_date DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*) / #{cnt}) AS pages FROM comment c JOIN board b ON c.board_idx = b.board_idx WHERE b.id = #{id} AND c.code_name IN ('B100', 'B101') AND c.use_yn = 'Y'

SELECT DISTINCT cl.chat_idx, CASE WHEN cl.id = u1.id THEN u2.id ELSE u1.id END AS other_id, c.create_date, cl.use_yn, cc.start_date FROM chat_link cl JOIN chat c ON cl.chat_idx = c.chat_idx JOIN chat_link u1 ON u1.chat_idx = cl.chat_idx JOIN chat_link u2 ON u2.chat_idx = cl.chat_idx LEFT JOIN ( SELECT chat_idx, MIN(start_date) AS start_date FROM chat_content GROUP BY chat_idx ) cc ON cc.chat_idx = cl.chat_idx WHERE cl.id = #{id} AND u1.id != #{id} AND cl.use_yn = 'N' ORDER BY cc.start_date DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(DISTINCT cl.chat_idx) / #{cnt}) AS pages FROM chat_link cl JOIN chat_link u1 ON u1.chat_idx = cl.chat_idx WHERE cl.id = #{id} AND u1.id != #{id} AND cl.use_yn = 'N'

SELECT ccl.chat_idx, cc.crew_idx, CASE WHEN ccl.id = u1.id THEN u2.id ELSE u1.id END AS other_id, latest_message.message_date, ccl.use_yn FROM crew_chat_link ccl JOIN crew_chat cc ON ccl.chat_idx = cc.chat_idx JOIN ( SELECT chat_idx, MAX(create_date) AS message_date FROM crew_chat_content GROUP BY chat_idx ) latest_message ON latest_message.chat_idx = ccl.chat_idx JOIN crew_chat_link u1 ON u1.chat_idx = cc.chat_idx JOIN crew_chat_link u2 ON u2.chat_idx = cc.chat_idx AND u2.id != ccl.id WHERE ccl.id = #{id} AND cc.code_cp = 'p' AND ccl.use_yn = 'N' GROUP BY ccl.chat_idx, other_id, cc.crew_idx, latest_message.message_date ORDER BY latest_message.message_date DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS pages FROM crew_chat_link ccl JOIN crew_chat cc ON ccl.chat_idx = cc.chat_idx WHERE ccl.id = #{id} AND cc.code_cp = 'p' AND ccl.use_yn = 'N'
